usage.cn: -Michael Jordan. 我可以接受失败，但绝对不能接受自己都未曾奋斗过。
usage.eng: I can accept failure but I can't accept not trying.

usage.cn: 有时候，虽然能想明白，但心里就是接受不了。
usage.eng: Sometimes our hearts just need time to accept what our heads already know.

usage.cn: 我们必须接受失望，因为它是有限的，但千万不可失去希望，因为它是无穷的。
usage.eng: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.

usage.cn: 在这充满温馨的季节里，给你我真挚的祝福及深深的思念
usage.eng: In such a soft and warm season, please accept my sincere blessing and deep concern for you.
